item.title: Members of Congress Speak Out on 'Unknown Drones'
item.description: Members of Congress are talking about "unknown drones" that have been seen flying around the New York and New Jersey skies over the last few weeks.

item.title: Trump Nominates Ronald Johnson as Ambassador to Mexico
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump nominated former El Salvador ambassador Ronald Johnson to be his next ambassador to Mexico on Tuesday night.
